name: PDFAnnotationTextWidget
desc: A PDFAnnotationTextWidget object allows you to manage the appearance and content of text fields.DeprecatedUse PDFAnnotationSubtype instead.

items.name: func stringValue() -> String!
items.desc: Returns the string assigned to the annotation.

items.name: func setStringValue(String!)
items.desc: Sets the string for the annotation.

items.name: func maximumLength() -> Int
items.desc: Returns the maximum number of characters allowed in the annotation string.

items.name: func setMaximumLength(Int)
items.desc: Sets the maximum number of characters allowed in the annotation string.

items.name: func font() -> NSFont!
items.desc: Returns the font used for the annotation’s text field.

items.name: func setFont(NSFont!)
items.desc: Sets the font used in the text field of the annotation.

items.name: func fontColor() -> NSColor!
items.desc: Returns the font color used for the annotation’s text field.

items.name: func setFontColor(NSColor!)
items.desc: Sets the font color used for the annotation’s text field.

items.name: func backgroundColor() -> NSColor!
items.desc: Returns the background color of the annotation text field.

items.name: func setBackgroundColor(NSColor!)
items.desc: Sets the background color of the annotation text field.

items.name: func alignment() -> NSTextAlignment
items.desc: Returns the text alignment setting for the annotation.

items.name: func setAlignment(NSTextAlignment)
items.desc: Sets the text alignment for the annotation.

items.name: func rotation() -> Int
items.desc: Returns the rotation angle of the annotation text field in degrees.

items.name: func setRotation(Int32)
items.desc: Sets the rotation angle of the annotation text field in degrees.

items.name: func fieldName() -> String!
items.desc: Returns the internal name for the annotation text field.

items.name: func setFieldName(String!)
items.desc: Sets the internal field name for the annotation text field.
